about_the_game:
Countin' Stars Demo is a procedurally generated puzzle game that’s as original as it is unique.

Carefully observe the night sky and count how many stars you see, but stay focused—other celestial objects will complicate your task. You’ll be presented with three possible answers, but only one will be correct. However, be warned—sometimes none of them will be right.

In those moments, you’ll need to use black holes to destroy stars or create new stars to make the count match the available options. If you choose incorrectly or run out of time, it’s game over.

Demo Content


In this demo, you'll play a shortened version of the game, where only up to two stars will appear together, making the difficulty lower. However, the gameplay remains endless, so enjoy the challenge!

Key Features


  • Procedurally generated gameplay, ensuring no two sessions are ever the same.
  • Relax with our cozy music and graphics style.
  • Destroy or create stars to align with the possible outcomes.
  • Enjoy the challenge of counting stars under pressure and improve your high score.

Countin' Stars Demo is a procedurally generated puzzle game that’s as original as it is unique.

Carefully observe the night sky and count how many stars you see, but stay focused—other celestial objects will complicate your task. You’ll be presented with three possible answers, but only one will be correct. However, be warned—sometimes none of them will be right.

In those moments, you’ll need to use black holes to destroy stars or create new stars to make the count match the available options. If you choose incorrectly or run out of time, it’s game over.

name: Countin' Stars Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Countin' Stars Demo is a procedurally generated puzzle game that challenges you to count the stars in the sky. Destroy or create stars to match the possible answers before time runs out.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Dutch, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Arabic, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Kannada, Catalan, Cherokee, Sinhala, Croatian, Dari, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Estonian, Basque, Filipino, Galician, Welsh, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Khmer, Kazakh, Kyrgyz, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, K'iche', Serbian, Sotho, Tswana, Sindhi, Sorani, Swahili, Tamil, Tajik, Telugu, Tigrinya, Turkmen, Tatar, Uyghur, Urdu, Uzbek, Valencian, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
